content:
Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft jungle_stairs, I need to craft jungle_planks. To do so, I need to move the jungle_log from slot 42 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the jungle_planks by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft jungle stairs, I first need to craft jungle planks. To do so, I need to place a jungle log in the crafting table. I will therefore move the jungle log from slot 42 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 43}]
thought: After moving the jungle log to slot 1, the jungle planks have been crafted. I will therefore move them to a free inventory slot (e.g., 12)
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft jungle stairs, I need to place three jungle planks in a row in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one jungle plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 43}]
thought: Next, I need to move another jungle plank to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 43}]
thought: Finally, I need to move the last jungle plank to slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 43}]

thought: Now that all three jungle planks are in the crafting grid, I need to craft them into jungle stairs. I will do this by moving the jungle plank from slot 11 to slot 7, which is below slot 4 and to the left of slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 7 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 43}]

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 8 with quantity 1

Ok

inventory=[{"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 9}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 39, "index": 31}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trident", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that the jungle stairs have been crafted, I need to move them to an empty inventory slot. I will move them to slot 11, which is currently empty.
Ok
